Optional Adobe Postscript 3.

Use Postscript driver for best result if your printer supports Postscript.

Works with Generic PCL 5c driver. Ricoh Aficio 1224C has been certified with Mandriva Linux Limited Edition 2005, Mandriva Linux 10.1 and Mandriva Linux Corporate Desktop 3.0.

Visit FAQ section for questions regarding user code, printing lots of blank pages, error code SC738, printing protocol, multiple copies, duplex on Mac, etc.

Download the PPD directly is easier and faster since it has no dependency requirement and the file size is much smaller. Visit FAQ section for installing a PPD file. Download the driver package if you want to install all drivers (100+).
